Title: To the Last Man
Plot: Toshiko falls for a handsome soldier, trapped out of his time, who unwittingly holds the key to saving the world. With an old hospital haunted by ghosts from 1918, a crisis foreseen by Torchwood 90 years ago is about to reach its climax. Time zones are colliding and with life and death decisions to be made, will Torchwood be able to stop an explosive end for Cardiff?
GuestStars: Anthony Lewis, Roderic Culver, Siobhan Hewlett, Lizzie Rogan, Ricky Fearon
